Theme your guest bedroom with a nautical vibe, surrounding the vintage with coolest blue or ice white walls, using the reds and yellows found in the blind to give the look some warmth with bedding, cushions, and wall art.

The gold would work beautifully in a grand living room or dining room, but why not forget convention and use this lush blind in the bathroom instead?
